review: I love my Chromecast. It is very easy to use, especially with my Chromebook I have. I not only use this to stream movies and videos for my daughters I use it with my kindle unlimited as a teaching tool. I home school my children and it is so much easier to stream whats on my screen then to have them crowded around the computer screen. It was very easy to set up .
author: mommyof2armybrats

review: Get this.It just gets better, more apps are added weekly
author: Kevin A. Dixon "Mark"

review: I have a Chromecast on every TV in the house.  It's the best thing to watch Youtube videos, and if you have a Plex server at home, you can stream virtually any video format to your TV with chromecast.
author: kiwi

review: I use this almost everyday, I love it. Thank you
author: Jose Olivares

review: Easy set up. Works pretty well.
author: LP
